description: 云上的流处理分析平台，对流数据进行实时采集和实时处理，帮助企业构建在线实时应用，充分利用流式数据。
description_en: TDH-RC is a stream processing platform on cloud that experts at real-time data collection and real-time processing. It aims to help enterprises build online real-time applications so as to make full use of online information.
